name: GEM's Hentai - Ultimate Puzzle
description:
With very high quality illustrations made by a real artist, this is the ultimate puzzle. You should arrange pieces and enjoy artistry, have fun.

Features

  • Animated illustrations;
  • Can be played with one hand;
  • 6 High quality arts with 3 variations each;
  • Autocomplete button for impatient "gamers";
  • Achievements;
  • Gallery.

Programmed Features

  • +6 High quality arts with 3 variations each;
  • Time trial mode;
  • Leaderboard;
  • Control support;
